author: Jacob Aron
title: Resident Evil 3 review: A glimpse into post-pandemic fiction
description: The video game Resident Evil 3 was in development long before the coronavirus outbreak, but it holds up a mirror to the strange times we live in today
content:
By Jacob Aron
The new Resident Evil is a remake of a classic 1999 game
Capcom
“This pandemic has spread faster than any disease in modern history.” The first words spoken in Resident Evil 3 make an instant impression in the era of the coronavirus crisis. T… [+3613 chars]
